word:
(Ch. 20:33, 34; 1 Thessalonians 2:9; 2 Thessalonians 3:8.) Paul Resorted to His Trade.--Paul . . . abode with them [Aquila and 
                                                                           1063
Priscilla]; and having in his youth learned their trade of making tents, which were much used in that warm climate, he worked at this business for his own support. . . .
